metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
Region to deploy solution resources
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Sentinel is setup
Resource name for the logic app playbook.  No spaces are allowed

body.Value: HYAS Insight Current WHOIS enrichment data for the domain "@{items('Looping_through_Hosts_Object')?['HostName']}.@{items('Looping_through_Hosts_Object')?['DnsDomain']}" :  @{replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(variables('Comment'),'"',''),'{',''),'}',''),'[',''),']','')}  For detailed information, see https://insight.hyas.com/static/details?domain=@{items('Looping_through_Hosts_Object')?['HostName']}.@{items('Looping_through_Hosts_Object')?['DnsDomain']}

inputs.name: Comment
inputs.value: No records found in HYAS Insight for domain "@{items('Looping_through_Hosts_Object')?['HostName']}@{items('Looping_through_Hosts_Object')?['DnsDomain']}."
